oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Interior of Commerce Union Bank, Nashville, Tennessee, circa 1950s
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An interior view of the Commerce Union Bank, circa the 1950s, with bank customers. This enterprise was originally started in 1916 by Nashville businessman Ed Potter. They were located at 400 Union in the downtown central business district. 1 photograph negative : b & w ; 4 x 5 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Commerce Union Bank (Nashville, Tenn.)
